issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: CBO : TPC-DS Q64 is item is joined last with store_sales while it should be first as it is the most selective

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: CBO
components.description: All issues dealing with Hive's cost based optimizer and its interaction with Optiq

fields.summary: CBO : When filter is applied on dimension table PK/FK code path is not in effect.

comments.body:
This tail recursion should probably be written as a loop. Also, are there other ops where you want to keep looking for table scan? 

Otherwise +1.

Other ops are handled by RelMdUniqueKeys.
will remove tail recursion: (i was thinking scala)

+1
With latest patch issue is fixed.
{code}
